SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.preupdate.prioritized

Class StateAwarePrioritizedPreUpdateExecutor<T extends KeyableBean>

java.lang.Object
gw.plugin.preupdate.prioritized.StateAwarePrioritizedPreUpdateExecutor<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The bean type that will be processed.
All Implemented Interfaces:
PrioritizedPreUpdateExecutor<T>
public abstract class StateAwarePrioritizedPreUpdateExecutor<T extends KeyableBean> extends Object implements PrioritizedPreUpdateExecutor<T>
This class is designed to help upgrade existing Surepath content to the new pre-upgrade implementation.

It handles beans in various states (Insert, Update, Remove) and executes the appropriate pre-update logic based on each bean's pre-update component.

This is an example implementation of an executor in Gosu that handles Activity beans during insertion, with the highest priority: 


 @ExecutionPriority(PreUpdatePriority.HIGHEST)
 class SampleActivityExecutor extends StateAwarePrioritizedPreUpdateExecutor<Activity>
     implements StateAwareInsert {

   protected override function executePreUpdate(beans : List<Activity>) {
       // Business logic
   }
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • StateAwarePrioritizedPreUpdateExecutor

      public StateAwarePrioritizedPreUpdateExecutor()
      Default constructor. It initializes the internal awareness flags for the state interfaces (StateAwareInsert, StateAwareUpdate, StateAwareRemove) by checking if the current instance implements these interfaces. At least one of the state interfaces must be implemented, otherwise, an IllegalStateException is thrown.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the class does not implement at least one of the following interfaces: StateAwareInsert, StateAwareUpdate, StateAwareRemove.

  • Method Details

    • executePreUpdate

      protected abstract void executePreUpdate(List<T> beans)
      Executes the pre-update logic for the provided list of beans.

      Subclasses must implement this method to define custom pre-update behavior for beans in a specific state (Insert, Update, or Remove).

      Parameters:
      beans - The list of entities to be processed in the pre-update phase.

    • executePreUpdate

      public final void executePreUpdate(PrioritizedPreUpdateContext<T> context)
      Executes the pre-update process based on the given , which contains the inserted, updated, and removed beans.

      This method determines which beans need to be processed based on their state and then calls executePreUpdate(List) with the relevant beans.

      Specified by:
      executePreUpdate in interface PrioritizedPreUpdateExecutor<T extends KeyableBean>
      Parameters:
      context - The context of the pre-update execution, which contains all the beans that have been inserted, updated, or removed.
